front.title: DPNSS/DASS 2 extensions to the IUA protocol

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for backhauling of DPNSS/DASS2messages over IP by extending the ISDN User Adaptation LayerProtocol Version 9 (<draft-ietf-sigtran-iua-09.txt>).The document aims to become an Appendix to IUA and to be thebase for a DUA implementation.
